All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddIncomeController
Controller class for the "Add Income" functionality.
AlertUtility
Utility class for displaying various types of alerts in the application.
App
The main entry point of the MiniBank application.
Author
Represents an Author in the system.
AuthorDAO
DAO class for managing Author data.
AuthorsController
Controller class for managing authors in the application.
CreateAuthorController
Controller class for the "Create Author" view.
DashboardController
Controller class for the "Dashboard" view.
DatabaseDriver
Manages the connection to the SQLite database.
DialogUtility
A utility class for displaying dialogs within the application.
GenericDAO<T>
Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface that provides basic CRUD operations for entities.
IncomeController
Controller class for the "Income" view.
LoginController
Controller class for the "Login" view.
MenuController
Controller class for the "Menu" view.
MenuOptions
Enum representing the different menu options available in the application.
Model
The central model class for the Library application.
RegisterController
Controller class for the "Register" view.
RouteController
Controller class responsible for routing between different views within the admin interface.
User
Represents a user in the system.
UserAuthUtils
Utility class for handling user authentication operations such as password verification and hashing.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the "Users" table in the database.
ViewFactory
Factory class responsible for managing and displaying various views in the application.
